Content.Text:
<FACE_HANA><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Now you know how to buy things. I'm glad
for you...

<FACE_HANA><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
What? You think I look bored?

<FACE_HANA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh dear, you saw that? The problem is,
there aren't many people here in town.
I want more people to talk to...

<FACE_HANA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
You'll talk with me? That's very nice
of you.
<PAGE>
But I know you're busy with other
things. Don't worry too much about me.

<FACE_HANA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Ah, I know! There is something you can
do for both me and the town.
<PAGE>
I have a friend who is an architect. She
used to live here in town.
<PAGE>
I sent her a letter mentioning that
things are better here in town, and so
she sent a blueprint for a house back.

<FACE_HANA><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
I totally forgot about it until just
now. I'm getting old!
<PAGE>
Now where did I put it...?

<FACE_HANA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Here it is. Please, take it.

<FACE_HANA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
If an architect comes to live in town
you'll be able to build a variety of
different buildings...
<PAGE>
And I'll also have someone to talk to!
I hope you can help out.

<FACE_HANA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh my, look at the time. I want to go
and take a walk. Would you like to come
with me?
